function.name: control_device_with_name
function.description: Control a device given its name and command.

device_name.description: The name of the device to control. e.g. 'リビングのライト', 'サーキュレーターのプラグ', '寝室のライト', 'リビングのカーテン', 'フロアライト'

command.description: The command to send to the device. e.g. 'turnOn', 'turnOff'
